channel.title: Server issues// adding shops - eclipse 317 source
channel.description:
I have searched high and low, even going through 20 pages of tuts and guides and still can't figure out my problem. my problem is that I don't know what goes wrong when I add a shop to the shops.cfg I edited it slightly, just adding another line with ny info instead. compiled just fine. but when I ran the server, it never started up. just went through this cmd prompt loop. forceclosed itself, and did it continuously. at first I thought it was just the shops.cfg, but world-objects.cfg made it loop as well. this all started with the want to make a custom donors shop, then downgraded to a regular shop in the donor zone, to just wanting to know what's happening. I want to also add a bank and skill area to my donorzone, but if I can't even find out how to correctly edit the files, I'm stuck with a useless command that takes me to tutorial island. I would appreciate some help, I am fairly new to java, but am learning fairly quickly.
other info: I am able toedit server-spawn.cfg fine, I have the npc where I want, just need to know how to connect a shop to him. I looked in src>server>models>PLAYER:client.java and couldn't even find wanneshop or anything like that. editing shophandler.java left me with a bunch of errors and most of it seemed to be connected to the skillcape shop. id offer pics but I'm on my phone atm. ill post a link to the source I'm using. change google to runel0cus www.google.com/forums/showthread.php?58699-Eclipse-Rsps-317-562-Dicing-Frosts-Gamble-zone this is the source and client I've been editing. credits to eclipse for source and coding apparently. I am not positive on linking, but if I need to change it I will. or delete.

item.title: Server issues// adding shops - eclipse 317 source
item.dc:creator: @thedolphin thedolphin
item.description:
@thedolphin wrote:

I have searched high and low, even going through 20 pages of tuts and guides and still can’t figure out my problem. my problem is that I don’t know what goes wrong when I add a shop to the shops.cfg I edited it slightly, just adding another line with ny info instead. compiled just fine. but when I ran the server, it never started up. just went through this cmd prompt loop. forceclosed itself, and did it continuously. at first I thought it was just the shops.cfg, but world-objects.cfg made it loop as well. this all started with the want to make a custom donors shop, then downgraded to a regular shop in the donor zone, to just wanting to know what’s happening. I want to also add a bank and skill area to my donorzone, but if I can’t even find out how to correctly edit the files, I’m stuck with a useless command that takes me to tutorial island. I would appreciate some help, I am fairly new to java, but am learning fairly quickly.

other info:
I am able toedit server-spawn.cfg fine, I have the npc where I want, just need to know how to connect a shop to him. I looked in src>server>models>PLAYER:client.java and couldn’t even find wanneshop or anything like that. editing shophandler.java left me with a bunch of errors and most of it seemed to be connected to the skillcape shop. id offer pics but I’m on my phone atm. ill post a link to the source I’m using.
change google to runel0cus
www.google.com/forums/showthread.php?58699-Eclipse-Rsps-317-562-Dicing-Frosts-Gamble-zone
this is the source and client I’ve been editing. credits to eclipse for source and coding apparently.
I am not positive on linking, but if I need to change it I will. or delete.
